DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Cost Analysis Plastic Stent Compare Metallic Stent Hilar Cholangiocarcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: There two type biliary stent : 1 ) plastic stent make polyethylene polytetrafluoroethylene ; , 2 ) metal stent braid form tubular mesh surgical-grade stainless steel alloy design expand maximum diameter 10 mm . The main drawback plastic stent relatively high occlusion rate , advantage low cost . The use metal stent hilar tumor many theoretical advantage : 1 ) flexible open-mesh design allow drainage secondary duct branch ; , 2 ) large diameter may provide good drainage longer patency ( ~3-9 month ) . Whether one type stent superior term adequacy drainage cost-effectiveness remains undefined . Therefore , would conduct study assess efficacy drainage endoscopically-inserted , unilateral , plastic stent vs. metallic stent unresectable , complex , hilar cholangiocarcinoma patient .
